page.title: 13SHOPPING
page.content: There are 3{shops}selling general {groceries,}one also being the village {Post Office}and{newsagent},2{butchers, one being mainly concerned with wholesale and frozen meat, a{baker}and a{clothier}and{florists}shop. Our survey showed that about 20% of shoppers do most of their food shopping in the village. About a third of shoppers buy some specific items regularly. Of the 80% who seem to do most of their shopping elsewhere they go equally to Cirencester, Chippenham or Yate. About a third of the shoppers replied that they go to{supermarkets}outside the village because they find that prices are lower and there is greater variety. For some these towns are also their places of work. Meat and bread are the items bought most regularly locally.
